generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running down its center, indicating it is a road used for vehicles.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated by curbs, which are sidewalks.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including a distinctive building with ornate architecture on the right and a red-roofed building in the center background.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the central building.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: Two individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Stopping" traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one supporting the traffic sign on the right and others along the sidewalk.
- bus: A white bus is visible in the distance on the right side of the road, approaching the viewer.
- train: The tram tracks and the bus indicate the presence of a tram system, which is a type of train.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible in the image.
- car: No cars are visible in the image.
- truck: No trucks are visible in the image.
- rider: No riders are visible in the image.
- terrain: No terrain areas are visible in the image.
